description: This file contains a set of exported asynchronous functions that serve as API helpers for fetching and normalizing data related to media content, such as featured items, trending lists, detailed info, and playback URLs. It also includes internal helper functions for data normalization.

methods.name: fetchJSON
methods.description: Fetch helper that performs a GET request to a relative API path, throws an error on non-OK responses, and returns parsed JSON.

methods.name: getFeatured
methods.description: Fetches data for the featured banner from /api/featured and returns a normalized item or null.

methods.name: getRail
methods.description: Loads a list of items from a specified API rail endpoint and maps them to UI-friendly fields.

methods.name: getTrending
methods.description: Wrapper around getRail('/api/trending') to fetch trending items.

methods.name: getInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed info for a show or movie by ID and returns normalized data.

methods.name: play
methods.description: Calls the API to get a playback URL for a given media ID.
